Represents an action card in Uno game.

Adds a new card to the hand of the player.

Color code to reset console color to default
Anticlockwise - Class in uno.rotation

antiClockWise - Static variable in class uno.UnoGame
anti-clockwise instance of the rotation
apply(UnoGame, int) - Method in class uno.card.Draw2
Applies the 2+ card action with specified cascade factor, that forces next player to pick two cards from store and lose turn.
apply(UnoGame, int) - Method in class uno.card.WildDraw
Applies the wild draw card cascade factor that changes ground color by player's will and forces next player to pick four cards from store and lose turn.
applyCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.card.Card
Applies the card.
applyCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.card.Draw2
Applies the 2+ card action that forces next player to pick two cards from store and lose turn.
applyCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.card.NumericCard
Applies the card that is simply put card on the ground and give turn to next player.
applyCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.card.Reverse
Applies the reverse card action that changes the game rotation.
applyCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.card.Skip
Applies the skip card action that skips next players turn.
applyCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.card.WildColor
Applies the wild color card action by asking player to choose a color for ground.
applyCard(UnoGame) - Method in class uno.card.WildDraw
Applies the wild draw card action that changes ground color by player's will and forces next player to pick four cards from store and lose turn.
applyCascadingCard(UnoGame, int) - Method in interface uno.card.CascadableCard
